code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from"@reduxjs/toolkit/dist/query/react";var initialState=[];export var productCategoryApiSlice=createApi({reducerPath:'productCategoryApi',baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:"/product_categories"}),tagTypes:['productCategories'],endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{fetchProductCategories:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/";},transformResponse:function transformResponse(response){return response.categories;},providesTags:["productCategories"]})};}});var useFetchProductCategoriesQuery=productCategoryApiSlice.useFetchProductCategoriesQuery;export{useFetchProductCategoriesQuery};export var productCategorySlice=createSlice({name:'product_categories',initialState:initialState,reducers:{resetProductCategorySlice:function resetProductCategorySlice(state){state=initialState;}}});var resetProductCategorySlice=productCategorySlice.actions.resetProductCategorySlice;export{resetProductCategorySlice};export default productCategorySlice.reducer;
